headline.main: Problems in Sleeping Have Obesity Link

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Dr. William C. Dement's research on truck drivers and sleep apnea is commendable (news article, May 14). However, the emphasis of the article is on the condition and medical and surgical treatments for it, rather than on the cause of it.
docs.snippet: To the Editor:   Dr. William C. Dement's research on truck drivers and sleep apnea is commendable (news article, May 14). However, the emphasis of the article is on the condition and medical and surgical treatments for it, rather than on the cause of...
